Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the involvement of Antifa in the storming of the Capitol, as there is no evidence to support this theory.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the individuals identified as Antifa were actually right-wing figures, as confirmed by their association with QAnon and other right-wing movements.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that Antifa infiltrated the Trump protesters.
Problematic assumption: The claim is based on the problematic assumption that Antifa activists disguised themselves as Trump supporters, which has been debunked by law enforcement officials and investigations.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the individuals identified as Antifa were actually right-wing figures with affiliations to QAnon and other similar movements.
